dimension: 16 x 11 x 3/4 in. (40.64 x 27.94 x 1.91 cm) (including pendants)
title: Silver Ornament
description: flat ring of hammered silver with dragons flanking a raised medallion; hanging pendants of moths, insects, flowers, fish, bells and tubular beads
creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
